statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ChannelName , AA.EngName , AA.ChannelType , AA.ChannelCode , AA.Description , AA.UseYn , M1.Name as ChannelTypeName
FROM dbo.LMChannel AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBAS.dbo.ACCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'ChannelType' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.ChannelType = #ChannelType#
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND ( AA.ChannelName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.EngName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.ChannelCode LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ChannelName , AA.EngName , AA.ChannelType , AA.ChannelCode , AA.Description , AA.UseYn
FROM dbo.LMChannel AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.LMChannel ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, ChannelName, EngName, ChannelCode, ChannelType, Description, UseYn ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #ChannelName#, #EngName#, #ChannelCode#, #ChannelType#, #Description#, #UseYn# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.LMChannel SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, ChannelName = #ChannelName# , EngName = #EngName# , ChannelType = #ChannelType# , ChannelCode = #ChannelCode# , Description = #Description# , UseYn = #UseYn# WHERE ID = #ID#
